sponsors.name: Tricentis
sponsors.description: Tricentis has been widely recognized as the leader by all major industry analysts, including being named a leader in Gartner’s Magic Quadrant five years in a row. Tricentis has more than 1,800 customers, including the largest brands in the world, such as Accenture, Coca-Cola, Nationwide Insurance, Allianz, Telstra, Dolby, RBS, and Zappos. To learn more, visit www.tricentis.com or follow us on LinkedIn, Twitter, and Facebook.

sponsors.name: Formstack
sponsors.description: Reimagine your data journey, native to Salesforce. Formstack for Salesforce helps improve the customer, patient, student, and client experience by progressively building on their profile, automating and simplifying manual tasks, and reducing the time it takes to complete processes. A seamless experience for data collection, document automation and digital signature all within Salesforce, allowing you to continually build on a 360-view of your customers.

sponsors.name: Veeam
sponsors.description: Veeam® is the leader in backup, recovery and data management solutions that deliver Modern Data Protection. The company provides a single platform for Cloud, Virtual, Physical, SaaS and Kubernetes environments. Veeam customers are confident their apps and data are protected from ransomware, disaster and harmful actors and always available with the most simple, flexible, reliable and powerful platform in the industry. Veeam protects over 400,000 customers worldwide, including 81% of the Fortune 500 and 70% of the Global 2,000. Headquartered in Columbus, Ohio, with offices in more than 30 countries, Veeam’s global ecosystem includes 35,000+ technology partners, resellers and service providers, and alliance partners. To learn more, visit https://www.veeam.com or follow Veeam on LinkedIn @veeam-software and Twitter @veeam.

sponsors.name: Prodly
sponsors.description:
Prodly enables Salesforce teams to increase productivity by 80 percent while reducing risk up to 30 percent by putting next-gen DevOps into the hands of admins and citizen developers. By reimagining the change management experience, Prodly delivers greater business agility, governance, and compliance without straining IT. The company’s AppOps offering has rapidly expanded from a CPQ data deployment tool to include solutions for modern Salesforce DevOps, data migration, sandbox seeding, and SOX compliance. Prodly AppOps sets the standard for low-code DevOps and can be implemented 20 times faster than traditional applications. The Prodly AppOps suite includes the following products: AppOps Release for Data, AppOps Release for Metadata, AppOps Environment Management, and AppOps Governance.

Prodly powers change management workflows for high-growth and Fortune 100 companies, including American Express, Expedia, Stanley Black & Decker, Cardinal Health, Nutanix, Johnson & Johnson, Splunk, Verizon, DoorDash, and Snowflake. The company is privately held and based in Palo Alto, California with global operations. For more information, visit prodly.co

sponsors.name: Southern Cloud Solutions Corporation
sponsors.description: Southern Cloud Solutions is a woman-owned Salesforce consulting and ISV partner founded in 2012. Announcing SoClo Inventory! Our new Appexchange product fills the gap between your sales and assets allowing you to manage fulfillment from multiple inventory locations for items sold, installed or manufactured.

sponsors.name: Elements.cloud
sponsors.description:
The basis of making intelligent decisions is a shared understanding of Org configuration. Elements automates the discovery by building documentation, bringing teams together, and breaking down silos of knowledge. It is the collective wisdom.

Then apply a rigorous approach and change intelligence to manage transformational change. Elements enables everyone to manage the Salesforce platform, not relying on Org Heroics. Applied consistently it can help you move to Org Excellence.

sponsors.name: Form Assembly
sponsors.description: FormAssembly is a trusted enterprise data collection platform that empowers security-conscious organizations to drive mission-critical business initiatives and become better stewards of their data. Our platform helps customers of all skill levels build efficient data collection workflows while meeting the high security and compliance standards of regulated industries. Used by thousands of organizations, FormAssembly integrates seamlessly with other commonly used systems to streamline processes and drive business results.

sponsors.name: CodeScan by AutoRABIT
sponsors.description:
Delivered on AutoRABIT’s DevSecOps platform, CodeScan provides total visibility into code health from the moment it’s written through final deployment into production. But the benefits don’t end there—CodeScan also flags existing technical debt your team might not even know currently exists.

Strong code and a reduction in technical debt supports a successful data security strategy by eliminating bugs and errors that leave your system vulnerable to attacks and outages.

Code reviews are complicated, repetitive, and time-consuming when performed manually. Not only does this take your team members away from pushing the update or application through the DevSecOps pipeline, but it also increases the chances of an error slipping through to deployment. CodeScan automates these code checks, greatly expediting the code review process—leading to increased feature delivery velocity and team member productivity.

CodeScan integrates seamlessly with AutoRABIT Automated Release Management tools like CI/CD. AutoRABIT provides the only unified DevSecOps platform for Salesforce developers, enabling compliance, security, quality, and speed

sponsors.name: Revenue Grid
sponsors.description: Revenue Grid is the first-to-market Revenue Intelligence platform that covers the full revenue cycle with the most comprehensive set of algorithmic Guided Selling capabilities. Revenue Grid uses complete customer journey data and sales teams’ unique processes and playbooks to create a dynamic guide fitting revenue org of any complexity. With over 15 years serving as the best sales activity data-capture solution on the market, Revenue Grid has unparalleled expertise in data integration, advanced analytics, and sales automation. Organizations as diverse as Hilton, Western Union, Moody’s, Trip Advisor, Red Cross, and Robert Half have chosen Revenue Grid thanks to its customizability and enterprise-readiness. Revenue Grid is a private company headquartered in Atlanta, GA. To learn more, visit revenuegrid.com.

sponsors.name: Titan
sponsors.description:
Dynamic, no-code Salesforce experiences are the driving force of the Titan mission. With Titan, clients get the most out of their Salesforce journey, via a full-suite of superb enterprise solutions, tailor-made to fluently integrate with Salesforce, across whole organizations.

Titan stands out from the crowd by providing enterprise applications that are fully-customized to suit the specific needs of clients. All products come easy to use, and clients can do everything they want with clicks, and zero code. Titan’s flexible solutions are cost-effective and used across practically every industry, from Technology to Finance, Education to Healthcare, Non-profits to Insurance, and many more.

Partnering with Salesforce, Titan is a game-changer in the industry, and is making the world’s number #1 CRM accessible, and effortless for anyone to use. Easily set-up, automate, track, and collaborate on forms, documents, business flows, surveys, web applications, and paperwork with Titan’s code-free products.

Titan's patent-protected technology enables clients to pull data directly from Salesforce, and push it back into Salesforce in real time. This bi-directional precision means end-users get all the data-driven power of Salesforce, without hassle. Products are 100% Salesforce integrated, end-to-end secure, and carefully designed to take Salesforce a step further, by optimizing usability and simplicity.

At the touch of a button, and with no code, experience strength, speed, and agility in the Salesforce industry. Transform your business by choosing Titan's Enterprise Applications for Salesforce today.

sponsors.name: Coastal Cloud
sponsors.description: Coastal Cloud is a Salesforce Multi-Cloud Expert Partner with deep experience across all aspects of a business: Marketing, Sales, Revenue, Billing, Service, Field Service, Community, Customer Success, ERP, Finance & Accounting, and Nonprofit Success Pack. Coastal Cloud is #1 on G2.com and maintains a 5 Star Salesforce AppExchange rating.

sponsors.name: Deloitte Digital
sponsors.description: Deloitte Digital helps create new growth by elevating the human experience with connected ideas, technology, and talent. We do this to shape a better future for every single one of us. Deloitte Digital works with our clients to develop customer-centric organizations; helping them take on the challenges of tomorrow and beyond.
